name: LEWIS MICHAELS
resume_snippet: LEWIS MICHAELS  Lewis Michaels is the founder and Principal Consultant at Michaels and Associates.  He has provided consulting services in the area of GMP compliance for pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies for over twenty-seven years.  His areas of expertise include GMP and GLP auditing of final dosage form and API manufacturers and CRO’s, Pre-Approval Inspection preparation, Quality Systems development, compliance and GMP training, problem resolution, gap analysis, mock PAI inspections
